messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the speed of a windstorm per point of POW of the participating polyp?
half a mile per hour
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does wind speed affect target damage?
1D4 damage for every 20 mph above 100 mph
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage taken by targets for every 20 mph above 100 mph of wind speed?
1D4 damage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage bonus for a Wind blast attack?
damage bonus (lowered by 1D6 per 20 yards distance)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage taken by physical weapons against the extra-terrene polyp?
reduced by 4 points due to the monster’s skin armor
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the probability of dodging the attack?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the sanity loss for seeing a flying polyp?
1D3/1D20 Sanity points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What do the explorers of K–Yan do when they escape alive?
They seal the passage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average damage bonus for Formless Spawn?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average magic points for Formless Spawn?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average build for Formless Spawn?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the move speed for Formless Spawn?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the typical location of Formless Spawn?
They are often found in his temples or in sun-less caverns.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the chance that a Formless Spawn knows a spell?
Spells: Formless spawn have a 25% chance of knowing 1 spell.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many attacks does a Formless Spawn make per round?
Attacks per round: 2 (limited to 1 Bite per round)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the typical Build of a Formless Spawn?
Average Build: 3
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average Magic Points of a Formless Spawn?
Average Magic Points: 10
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the victim immediately after being bitten?
The victim is instantly swallowed.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage does the victim take in the first round?
1 point of damage from constriction
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the damage taken by the victim increase each round?
Progressively increasing by 1 point per round
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the damage taken by the victim each round?
The damage done per round progressively increases
You are a helpful AI assistant.
On the second round, how much damage does the victim take?
2 points of damage
